```{r}
#| echo: false

pacman::p_load(leaflet)

map_df = data.frame(
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE,
  name = c("認知症介護研究・研修大府センター", 
           "JR大府駅", 
           "JR名古屋駅"),
  longitude = c(136.9410486, 
                 136.9599631, 
                 136.8793482),
  latitude = c(34.997851, 
               35.0086221, 
               35.1709194),
  color = c("green", 
            "orange",
            "orange")
            )

icon = awesomeIcons(
  icon = ifelse(
    map_df$name == '認知症介護研究・研修大府センター', 'building',
    'train'),
  iconColor = 'black',
  library = 'fa',
  markerColor = ifelse(
    map_df$name == '認知症介護研究・研修大府センター', 'green',
    'orange'))


leaflet(map_df) %>% 
  addTiles() %>%
  addAwesomeMarkers(~longitude,
                    ~latitude,
                    icon = icon,
                    popup = ~name,
                    label = ~name
                    )


```
